info.title: API to work with Helios Nephrite
info.description: Swagger with ASP.NET Core API of Helios Nephrite. (version: 6.0.22-rc)

get.summary: Gets record periods defined in configuration. According to periodQueryParams currently active periods can be returned as well.

parameters.name: PeriodKind
parameters.description: Kind of period to get.

parameters.name: PeriodRange
parameters.description: Range of period to get.

post.summary:
Authorizes the user specified in the authenticateInfo parameter.
Each call to this endpoint causes a new session to be created on the application server. To authorize endpoints that require a basic authorization, you must use the returned values "UserName" as the login name and "UserId" as the password.
post.description:
Sample request with a HeN account:
```
POST /api/connect/login HTTP/1.1
Host: localhost:53078
Content-Type: application/json
{
    "username": "username",
    "password": "password",
    "LanguageId"   : "CZ",
    "DbProfile": "test_env",
    "ServerURL" : "http://www.mydomain.cz/hen"
}
```

Sample request with a domain account:
```
POST /api/connect/login HTTP/1.1
Host: localhost:53078
Content-Type: application/json
{
    "username": "ASOL\\username",
    "password": "domain password",
    "UseWindowsAuthentication": true,
    "UseCurrentUserCredentials": false
    "LanguageId"   : "CZ",
    "DbProfile": "test_env",
    "ServerURL" : "http://www.mydomain.cz/hen"
}
```

200.description:
Returns info of authenticated user:
``` { "success": true, "statusCode": 200, "errorMessage": "", "userName": "ASOL\\username", "userId": "UserId 31f49a7ddc18e97247308d5180ac684890f5a5c3442e0ab7115e037f6d6dd2f6" } ```
Use returned "userName" value as user name and "userId" value as password for following basic authorization for requests that require an authentication then.

400.description:
If authorization failed:
``` { "type": "https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7231#section-6.5.1", "title": "BadRequest", "status": 400, "detail": "Application server connection credentials are not valid.", "instance": "POST /api/Connect/LogIn", } ```

500.description:
If an unexpected error occurred. Check the log then.
``` { "type": "https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7235#section...", "title": "InternalServerError", "status": 500, "detail": ""Unknown error, check the log, please."", "instance": "POST /api/Connect/LogIn", } ```

get.summary: Gets info about currently authenticated user.

post.summary: Logs out currently authorized user and removes it from authenticated users.

Function which imports data in file specified in functionQuerySettings parameter (ASOL.WebAPI.Core.DataTransfers.Contracts.GeneralImportFunctionQuery.FileUID).
First file has to be uploaded by one of endpoint on route /api/v1/Files/.
Those endpoints return a unique file identifier, which has to be passed to this endpoint.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the General import entity with a definition which is used to import data.

parameters.name: FileUID
parameters.description: Unique id of previously uploaded file by an endpoint /api/v{N}/files/upload.

parameters.name: FolderId
parameters.description:
Gets or sets folder identifier. Folder can be considered as a context in which the function runs. 
If ASOL.Nephrite.WebAPI.Contracts.ModelFunctionQueryBase.FolderId equals 0, the function runs over view, whose folder is not defined.
If ASOL.Nephrite.WebAPI.Contracts.ModelFunctionQueryBase.FolderId is not entered, default value is used.
This is an optional parameter for specific scenarios.

parameters.name: StoredParamsId
parameters.description: Identifier of predefined set of parameters which are stored in dedicated entity with identifier no. 1496.

parameters.name: ReturnLogDetail
parameters.description: Gets or sets if ASOL.Nephrite.WebAPI.Contracts.IFunctionResult log detail should be part of the message.

post.summary:
Exports records to PDF via a form report.
A record or a collection of records to export has to be specified in a payload.
A class of records corresponds to a class of a report that is specified in the route parameter reportId.

If the report contains any parameter, its name and value have to be specified in a payload.

parameters.name: reportId
parameters.description: Unique identifier of a form report.

parameters.name: CheckCrc
parameters.description:
Check CRC of exported file after file is downloaded from application server of Helios.
This can consume some additional time.

parameters.name: ASOL-WebAPI-Period
parameters.description:
If this header is specified, request will be processed in context of specified period(s). More headers with this name may be specified to set more kinds of period in one call.
Values of standard period kinds can be:
Accounting=0x0000000100000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000 Calendar=0x0000000080000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
The hex string is a code of period.
Values of custom period kinds uses a syntax like:
Custom|HumanResources=2022-02-01T00:00:00Z
It means the code of period is composite one. First "Custom" key must be specified and after separator char ('|') is the custom period code itself.
To get period codes call GET /api/v{N}/Configuration/Periods endpoint.

200.description:
Records was exported to PDF file and the file was returned in response body as content. 
The content-type is "application/pdf" and the suggested file name is returned in Content-Disposition header.

post.summary:
Exports records to PDF via a browse report.
An optional collection of records to export can be specified in a payload.
A class of records, as well as the class of a folder, filter, etc. corresponds to the class of the report that is specified in the route parameter reportId.

If the report contains any parameter, its name and value have to be specified in a payload.

parameters.name: reportId
parameters.description: Unique identifier of a browse report.

parameters.name: CheckCrc
parameters.description:
Check CRC of exported file after file is downloaded from application server of Helios.
This can consume some additional time.

parameters.name: ASOL-WebAPI-Period
parameters.description:
If this header is specified, request will be processed in context of specified period(s). More headers with this name may be specified to set more kinds of period in one call.
Values of standard period kinds can be:
Accounting=0x0000000100000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000 Calendar=0x0000000080000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
The hex string is a code of period.
Values of custom period kinds uses a syntax like:
Custom|HumanResources=2022-02-01T00:00:00Z
It means the code of period is composite one. First "Custom" key must be specified and after separator char ('|') is the custom period code itself.
To get period codes call GET /api/v{N}/Configuration/Periods endpoint.

200.description:
Records was exported to PDF file and the file was returned in response body as content. 
The content-type is "application/pdf" and the suggested file name is returned in Content-Disposition header.

post.summary:
Exports records to PDF via a default browse base template. 
A default browse base template is either a template of an implicit view of a current user if it is defined,
or a default browse base template for a class.

An optional collection of records to export can be specified in a payload.
A class of records, as well as the class of a folder, filter, template, etc. corresponds to the class in the route parameter classId.

If the default browse base template contains inner filter that contains any parameter, its name and have to be specified in a payload.

parameters.name: classId
parameters.description: Unique identifier of a class.

parameters.name: CheckCrc
parameters.description:
Check CRC of exported file after file is downloaded from application server of Helios.
This can consume some additional time.

parameters.name: ASOL-WebAPI-Period
parameters.description:
If this header is specified, request will be processed in context of specified period(s). More headers with this name may be specified to set more kinds of period in one call.
Values of standard period kinds can be:
Accounting=0x0000000100000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000 Calendar=0x0000000080000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
The hex string is a code of period.
Values of custom period kinds uses a syntax like:
Custom|HumanResources=2022-02-01T00:00:00Z
It means the code of period is composite one. First "Custom" key must be specified and after separator char ('|') is the custom period code itself.
To get period codes call GET /api/v{N}/Configuration/Periods endpoint.

200.description:
Records was exported to PDF file and the file was returned in response body as content. 
The content-type is "application/pdf" and the suggested file name is returned in Content-Disposition header.

post.summary:
Exports records to PDF via a default browse base template.
A default browse base template is either a template of an implicit view of a current user if it is defined,
or a default browse base template for a class.

An optional collection of records to export can be specified in a payload.
A class of records, as well as the class of a folder, filter, template, etc. corresponds to the class in the route parameter classSymbolicName.

If the default browse base template contains inner filter that contains any parameter, its name and have to be specified in a payload.

parameters.name: classSymbolicName
parameters.description: Symbolic name of a class. It is assumed that the author is Asseco Solutions.

parameters.name: CheckCrc
parameters.description:
Check CRC of exported file after file is downloaded from application server of Helios.
This can consume some additional time.

parameters.name: ASOL-WebAPI-Period
parameters.description:
If this header is specified, request will be processed in context of specified period(s). More headers with this name may be specified to set more kinds of period in one call.
Values of standard period kinds can be:
Accounting=0x0000000100000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000 Calendar=0x0000000080000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
The hex string is a code of period.
Values of custom period kinds uses a syntax like:
Custom|HumanResources=2022-02-01T00:00:00Z
It means the code of period is composite one. First "Custom" key must be specified and after separator char ('|') is the custom period code itself.
To get period codes call GET /api/v{N}/Configuration/Periods endpoint.

200.description:
Records was exported to PDF file and the file was returned in response body as content. 
The content-type is "application/pdf" and the suggested file name is returned in Content-Disposition header.

post.summary:
Exports records to PDF via a default browse base template.
A default browse base template is either a template of an implicit view of a current user if it is defined,
or a default browse base template for a class.

An optional collection of records to export can be specified in a payload.
A class of records, as well as the class of a folder, filter, template, etc. corresponds to the class in the route parameters authorSymbolicName/classSymbolicName.

If the default browse base template contains inner filter that contains any parameter, its name and have to be specified in a payload.

parameters.name: authorSymbolicName
parameters.description: Symbolic name of an author of the class (classSymbolicName).

parameters.name: classSymbolicName
parameters.description: Symbolic name of a class.

parameters.name: CheckCrc
parameters.description:
Check CRC of exported file after file is downloaded from application server of Helios.
This can consume some additional time.

parameters.name: ASOL-WebAPI-Period
parameters.description:
If this header is specified, request will be processed in context of specified period(s). More headers with this name may be specified to set more kinds of period in one call.
Values of standard period kinds can be:
Accounting=0x0000000100000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000 Calendar=0x0000000080000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
The hex string is a code of period.
Values of custom period kinds uses a syntax like:
Custom|HumanResources=2022-02-01T00:00:00Z
It means the code of period is composite one. First "Custom" key must be specified and after separator char ('|') is the custom period code itself.
To get period codes call GET /api/v{N}/Configuration/Periods endpoint.

200.description:
Records was exported to PDF file and the file was returned in response body as content. 
The content-type is "application/pdf" and the suggested file name is returned in Content-Disposition header.

get.summary: Reads external documents according to query parameters.

parameters.name: FileName
parameters.description:
Name of file.
Including the '%' character in the parameter value causes the comparison operator "LIKE" to be used instead of "EQUALS"

parameters.name: State
parameters.description:
State of document (custom valuated attribute, it may differ for every customer).
Use data values of a defined attribute valuation to query documents of the requested state.

parameters.name: Location
parameters.description: Location of external document.

parameters.name: Reference
parameters.description:
A reference code of document.
Including the '%' character in the parameter value causes the comparison operator "LIKE" to be used instead of "EQUALS"

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description:
Name of a document.
Including the '%' character in the parameter value causes the comparison operator "LIKE" to be used instead of "EQUALS"

parameters.name: Skip
parameters.description:
Number of rows which are skipped during retrieval of data.
If not specified, no rows are skipped. It means, the first row on the first page is displayed at the top of the page.

parameters.name: Top
parameters.description:
Page size.
If not specified, 100 is used

parameters.name: FolderId
parameters.description: Folder identifier where to get documents from. If not set, a condition on a folder will not be applied.

parameters.name: Timestamp
parameters.description: If set, documents with timestamps greater than this timestamp are returned.

parameters.name: FileContent
parameters.description: If true, content of external document is returned too. Default true.

get.summary: Reads an external document according to query parameters.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Identifier of external document

parameters.name: FileContent
parameters.description: If true, content of external document is returned too. Default true.

parameters.name: Timestamp

parameters.name: FileContent
parameters.description: If true, content of external document is returned too. Default true.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Identifier of external document

post.summary:
Uploads a file to the Web API server temp directory. 
Beware! Uploaded file is kept limited time only! See query parameters for more information.

parameters.name: Priority
parameters.description: The priority for keeping the cache entry in the cache during a memory pressure tokened cleanup. Possible values: low, normal, high, neverRemove.

parameters.name: AbsoluteExpirationRelativeToNow
parameters.description: Defines an absolute expiration time (in minutes), relative to time when a cache entry was stored.

parameters.name: SlidingExpiration
parameters.description:
Defines how long (in minutes) the cache entry can be inactive (e.g. not accessed) before it will be removed. 
This will not extend the entry lifetime beyond the absolute expiration (if set).

post.summary:
Uploads files to the WebAPI server temp directory.
Beware! Uploaded files are kept limited time only! See query parameters for more information.

parameters.name: Priority
parameters.description: The priority for keeping the cache entry in the cache during a memory pressure tokened cleanup. Possible values: low, normal, high, neverRemove.

parameters.name: AbsoluteExpirationRelativeToNow
parameters.description: Defines an absolute expiration time (in minutes), relative to time when a cache entry was stored.

parameters.name: SlidingExpiration
parameters.description:
Defines how long (in minutes) the cache entry can be inactive (e.g. not accessed) before it will be removed. 
This will not extend the entry lifetime beyond the absolute expiration (if set).

post.summary:
Uploads a file to the WebAPI server temp directory. File size limit is 1 GB.
File is passed as "multipart/form-data", however body with those file is read by a stream reader continuously.
Beware! Uploaded file is kept limited time only! See query parameters for more information.

parameters.name: Priority
parameters.description: The priority for keeping the cache entry in the cache during a memory pressure tokened cleanup. Possible values: low, normal, high, neverRemove.

parameters.name: AbsoluteExpirationRelativeToNow
parameters.description: Defines an absolute expiration time (in minutes), relative to time when a cache entry was stored.

parameters.name: SlidingExpiration
parameters.description:
Defines how long (in minutes) the cache entry can be inactive (e.g. not accessed) before it will be removed. 
This will not extend the entry lifetime beyond the absolute expiration (if set).

post.summary: Uploads a file to the Helios Nephrite application server temp directory ("Upload").

parameters.name: CheckCrc
parameters.description: If true, content CRC of an uploaded file is checked while uploading file to Helios Nephrite application server.

post.summary: Uploads files to the Helios Nephrite application server temp directory ("Upload").

parameters.name: CheckCrc
parameters.description: If true, content CRC of an uploaded file is checked while uploading file to Helios Nephrite application server.

post.summary:
Uploads a file to the Helios Nephrite application server temp directory ("Upload"). File size limit is 1 GB.
File is passed as "multipart/form-data", however body with those file is read by a stream reader continuously.

parameters.name: CheckCrc
parameters.description: If true, content CRC of an uploaded file is checked while uploading file to Helios Nephrite application server.

get.summary: Gets collection of records according to parameters.

parameters.name: classId
parameters.description: Class/Entity unique identifier.

parameters.name: FolderId
parameters.description:
Folder where records to get are stored.
If zero or null, default folder is used.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: Gets or sets identifier of template or view which is used to browse data. 0 or unspecified value means a user default template or view is used.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: Type of a browse. Default is ASOL.Nephrite.WebAPI.Contracts.BrowseType.Template.

parameters.name: Filter
parameters.description:
Filter expression to get data.
THIS PROPERTY'S NOT SUPPORTED YET! DON'T USE IT AT ALL! IT IS IGNORED! INSTEAD, USE A PREDEFINED FILTER (ASOL.Nephrite.WebAPI.Contracts.QueryParameters.BrowseQueryParameters.FilterId) or filter which is a part of a browse template (ASOL.Nephrite.WebAPI.Contracts.QueryParameters.BrowseQueryParameters.Id).

parameters.name: FilterId
parameters.description: Unique identifier of a predefined filter to get data.

parameters.name: FilterParams
parameters.description:
Optional. It has to be specified when a filter definition (ASOL.Nephrite.WebAPI.Contracts.QueryParameters.BrowseQueryParameters.FilterId) contains variable arguments.
Variable arguments of a filter which is specified in ASOL.Nephrite.WebAPI.Contracts.QueryParameters.BrowseQueryParameters.FilterId. They have to be specified when this filter contains at least one parameter which value is specified as a variable (a named parameter). This value has to be specified at the moment when the filter is applied. If value of parameter is not set, it will be marked as skipped, see Description in example. If value is null, a null value will be passed to parameter.
Example: ?FilterParams=Code='ABC'&FilterParams=Price=123.56&FilterParams=issueDate=2021-11-03T00:00:00&FilterParams=Description&FilterParams=Code=null

parameters.name: TemplateFilterParams
parameters.description:
Optional. It has to be specified when a browse template filter definition (ASOL.Nephrite.WebAPI.Contracts.QueryParameters.BrowseQueryParameters.Id) contains variable arguments.
Variable arguments of a filter which is part of a browse template filter definition (default one for a current user or specified in ASOL.Nephrite.WebAPI.Contracts.QueryParameters.BrowseQueryParameters.Id). They have to be specified when this filter contains at least one parameter which value is specified as a variable (a named parameter). This value has to be specified at the moment when the filter is applied. If value of parameter is not set, it will be marked as skipped, see Description in example. If value is null, a null value will be passed to parameter.
Example: TemplateFilterParams=Code='ABC'&TemplateFilterParams=Price=123.56&TemplateFilterParams=issueDate=2021-11-03T00:00:00&TemplateFilterParams=Description&TemplateFilterParams=Code=null

parameters.name: OrderBy
parameters.description:
Sort order rules for returned data.
Rules have to match a column definition of template which is used to retrieve data.
Format is: "[template column name] [sort direction]", e.g.: ?orderBy=name desc,hireDate. Also "asc" can be used for more clarity.
If neither "desc" nor "asc" is used, "asc" is used by default.

parameters.name: TotalCount
parameters.description:
Gets or sets if ASOL.Nephrite.WebAPI.Contracts.BrowseResponse should contain the total number of rows.
Default is false.

parameters.name: Count
parameters.description:
Gets or sets if ASOL.Nephrite.WebAPI.Contracts.BrowseResponse should contain the number of rows on current page..
Default is true.

parameters.name: Skip
parameters.description:
Number of rows which are skipped during retrieval of data.
If not specified, no rows are skipped. It means, the first row on the first page is displayed at the top of the page.

parameters.name: Top
parameters.description:
Page size.
If not specified, default user settings will be used.

parameters.name: ASOL-WebAPI-Period
parameters.description:
If this header is specified, request will be processed in context of specified period. More headers with this name may be specified.
Values can be:
Accounting=0x0000000100000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000 Calendar=0x0000000080000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
The hex string is a code of period.
To get period codes call GET /api/vX/Configuration/Periods endpoint.

get.summary: Gets collection of records according to parameters.

parameters.name: classSymbolicName
parameters.description: Class/Entity symbolic name in plural. Author no. 1 (Asseco solutions) is used.

parameters.name: FolderId
parameters.description:
Folder where records to get are stored.
If zero or null, default folder is used.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: Gets or sets identifier of template or view which is used to browse data. 0 or unspecified value means a user default template or view is used.

parameters.name: Type

parameters.name: Filter

INSTEAD, USE A PREDEFINED FILTER (ASOL.Nephrite.WebAPI.Contracts.QueryParameters.BrowseQueryParameters.FilterId) or filter which is a part of a browse template (ASOL.Nephrite.WebAPI.Contracts.QueryParameters.BrowseQueryParameters.Id).

parameters.name: FilterId

parameters.name: FilterParams
parameters.description:
Optional. It has to be specified when a filter definition (ASOL.Nephrite.WebAPI.Contracts.QueryParameters.BrowseQueryParameters.FilterId) contains variable arguments.
Variable arguments of a filter which is specified in ASOL.Nephrite.WebAPI.Contracts.QueryParameters.BrowseQueryParameters.FilterId. They have to be specified when this filter contains at least one parameter which value is specified as a variable (a named parameter). This value has to be specified at the moment when the filter is applied. If value of parameter is not set, it will be marked as skipped, see Description in example. If value is null, a null value will be passed to parameter.
Example: ?FilterParams=Code='ABC'&FilterParams=Price=123.56&FilterParams=issueDate=2021-11-03T00:00:00&FilterParams=Description&FilterParams=Code=null

parameters.name: TemplateFilterParams
parameters.description:
Optional. It has to be specified when a browse template filter definition (ASOL.Nephrite.WebAPI.Contracts.QueryParameters.BrowseQueryParameters.Id) contains variable arguments.
Variable arguments of a filter which is part of a browse template filter definition (default one for a current user or specified in ASOL.Nephrite.WebAPI.Contracts.QueryParameters.BrowseQueryParameters.Id). They have to be specified when this filter contains at least one parameter which value is specified as a variable (a named parameter). This value has to be specified at the moment when the filter is applied. If value of parameter is not set, it will be marked as skipped, see Description in example. If value is null, a null value will be passed to parameter.
Example: TemplateFilterParams=Code='ABC'&TemplateFilterParams=Price=123.56&TemplateFilterParams=issueDate=2021-11-03T00:00:00&TemplateFilterParams=Description&TemplateFilterParams=Code=null

parameters.name: OrderBy
parameters.description:
Sort order rules for returned data.
Rules have to match a column definition of template which is used to retrieve data.
Format is: "[template column name] [sort direction]", e.g.: ?orderBy=name desc,hireDate. Also "asc" can be used for more clarity.
If neither "desc" nor "asc" is used, "asc" is used by default.

parameters.name: TotalCount
parameters.description:
Gets or sets if ASOL.Nephrite.WebAPI.Contracts.BrowseResponse should contain the total number of rows.
Default is false.

parameters.name: Count
parameters.description:
Gets or sets if ASOL.Nephrite.WebAPI.Contracts.BrowseResponse should contain the number of rows on current page..
Default is true.

parameters.name: Skip
parameters.description:
Number of rows which are skipped during retrieval of data.
If not specified, no rows are skipped. It means, the first row on the first page is displayed at the top of the page.

parameters.name: Top
parameters.description:
Page size.
If not specified, default user settings will be used.

parameters.name: ASOL-WebAPI-Period
parameters.description:
If this header is specified, request will be processed in context of specified period. More headers with this name may be specified.
Values can be:
Accounting=0x0000000100000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000 Calendar=0x0000000080000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
The hex string is a code of period.
To get period codes call GET /api/vX/Configuration/Periods endpoint.

AdresaUpdate.description: CZ: Vstupn typ/Request pro aktualizaci adresy

AttributesCollection{IAttributeResult}.description: Class which contains collection of of user defined attributes.

AttributesCollection{IUserDefinedAttribu.description: Class which contains collection of of user defined attributes.

userName.description:
Gets or sets the user name (login name or login email).
It can be unspecified when ASOL.Nephrite.WebAPI.AuthProvider.Contracts.AuthenticateRequest.UseWindowsAuthentication and ASOL.Nephrite.WebAPI.AuthProvider.Contracts.AuthenticateRequest.UseCurrentUserCredentials is true, otherwise it has to be filled.

password.description:
Gets or sets the password.
It can be unspecified when ASOL.Nephrite.WebAPI.AuthProvider.Contracts.AuthenticateRequest.UseWindowsAuthentication and ASOL.Nephrite.WebAPI.AuthProvider.Contracts.AuthenticateRequest.UseCurrentUserCredentials is true, otherwise it has to be filled.

useWindowsAuthentication.description:
If true, windows authentication is used to connect to HeG (System.Net.NetworkCredential are created and used to login). If ASOL.Nephrite.WebAPI.AuthProvider.Contracts.AuthenticateRequest.UseCurrentUserCredentials is true as well, ASOL.Nephrite.WebAPI.AuthProvider.Contracts.AuthenticateRequest.UserName and ASOL.Nephrite.WebAPI.AuthProvider.Contracts.AuthenticateRequest.Password are ignored. System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials are used then.
If false, basic authentication using ASOL.Nephrite.WebAPI.AuthProvider.Contracts.AuthenticateRequest.UserName and ASOL.Nephrite.WebAPI.AuthProvider.Contracts.AuthenticateRequest.Password is used to connect to HeG.
This property must filled when default value is not specified in application settings or if a different value should be used. The application can be set such way, this property may not be set at all. Contact administrator to ensure how to authenticate if needed.

useCurrentUserCredentials.description:
This property is taken into account when ASOL.Nephrite.WebAPI.AuthProvider.Contracts.AuthenticateRequest.UseWindowsAuthentication is true only. System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials are used instead of ASOL.Nephrite.WebAPI.AuthProvider.Contracts.AuthenticateRequest.UserName and ASOL.Nephrite.WebAPI.AuthProvider.Contracts.AuthenticateRequest.Password then.
This property must filled when default value is not specified in application settings or if a different value should be used. The application can be set such way, this property may not be set at all. Contact administrator to ensure how to authenticate if needed.

languageId.description:
Gets or sets the code of language (czech is CZ, slovak is SK, english is EN).
This property must filled when default language is not specified in application settings or if a different language should be used. The application can be set such way, this property may not be set at all. Contact administrator to ensure how to authenticate if needed.

dbProfile.description:
Gets or sets the db profile where the user is to be connected to.
This property must filled when default db profile is not specified in application settings or if a different db profile should be used. The application can be set such way, this property may not be set at all. Contact administrator to ensure how to authenticate if needed.

serverURL.description:
Gets or sets the URL of application server.
This property must filled when default server URL is not specified in application settings or if a different server be used. The application can be set such way, this property may not be set at all. Contact administrator to ensure how to authenticate if needed.

errorMessage.description: Error message in case of authentication was not successful..

userId.description: Unique identifier to log-in. Something like token.

dataFormat.description: Defines the format how to display data.

italica.description: Is an Italica used for font?

align.description:
<list type="bullet">
  <listheader>Aligning of a column.</listheader>
  <item>0 - Left</item>
  <item>1 - Right</item>
  <item>2 - Center</item>
</list>

dataTypeRepo.description:
Data type of a column - repository definition.
"money" , "varchar" , "string", "datetime", "date", "time", "folder", "boolean" , "multilline_text", "text", "pointer", "binary"

fullDbName.description: Full db name in a select command.

relationNumber.description: If column ASOL.Nephrite.WebAPI.Contracts.BrowseColumnInfo.FullDbName represents a relation or column from related method, its number is stored on this property, otherwise null.

BrowseColumnInfo.description: Data structure represents information about one browse column.

BrowseDataRowInfo.description: Data structure representing non-formating (nonvisual) information about one browse row.

BrowseGroupRowInfo.description: Data structure containing non-formating (nonvisual) information about one group row.

totalRowCount.description: Count of all rows for specified conditions. -1 if information is not accessible.

rowCount.description: Count of returned rows. -1 if information is not accessible.

browseId.description: Identifier of template that was used to retrieve data.

folderId.description: Folder where the retrieved data was stored. If zero, returned data belongs or may belong to more folders.

classId.description: Identifier of entity (class) where the retrieved data belongs to.

columnsInfo.description: Collection of column definitions of the retrieved data.

rowsInfo.description: Collection of row definitions of the retrieved data.

BrowseResponse.description: Response of for retrieval data requests (ASOL.Nephrite.WebAPI.Contracts.BrowseRequest).

custom.description: An accounting periods that is active for a current session.

CurrentRecordPeriodResult.description: Periods that are active for a current session.

name.description: Display name of period (e.g. Accounting period)

state.description: State of document (custom valuated attribute, it may differ for every customer).

fileContentError.description: Error message while content of file was downloaded. Null means no error occurred.

DMSDocumentItemResult.description: Information about a response item of DMS document (Document Managed System document).

DMSDocumentsResult.description: Response for GET operation for DMS document (Document Managed System document)

DecimalDigitsConflict.description: Way how to solve a conflict in a number of decimal digits.

DeletionDataMode.description: Ways how delete data in target class before import.

recordIds.description:
Collection of records to export.
A class of records corresponds to a class of a report, or symbolic name, that is specified in the route. 
The filter will be used to filter records to export.

folderId.description:
An optional folder of records.
If set, it have to correspond with class of report, or symbolic name.
The filter will be used to filter records to export.

filterId.description:
An optional filter identifier.
If set, the filter will be used to filter records to export.

filterParams.description: Optional filter parameters for a filter in FilterId parameter.

reportParams.description:
Optional report parameters. 
Those parameters are determined either for parameters of a report itself or for parameters of a filter which is specified directly in the template.

ExportFilePdfBrowseRequest.description: Payload for export records to PDF via a browse report.

recordIds.description:
Collection of records to export.
A class of records corresponds to a class of a report that is specified in the route.

reportParams.description:
Optional report parameters.
Those parameters are determined for parameters of a report.

ExportFilePdfFormRequest.description: Payload for export records to PDF via a form report.

state.description: State of document (custom valuated attribute, it may differ for every customer).

fileContentError.description: Error message while content of file was downloaded. Null means no error occurred.

ExternalDocumentItemResult.description: Information about a response item of external document.

ExternalDocumentsResult.description: Response for getting of external documents.

FixedAssetGetResponse.description:
API GET Customer/Pantheon/Majetek RESPONSE
API GET Customer/Pantheon/Majetek/{type}/{id} RESPONSE

stav.description:
CZ: Stav majetku: 
    1 - Pevzat do evidence, 
    2 - Zaazen, 
    3 - Aktivn, 
    4 - Pipraven k vyazen, 
    5 - Vyazen, 
    6 - Peveden, 
    7 - Stornovn,
    8 - Pedimportovn,
    9 - Pedzpracovn.

relationId.description:
Gets or sets unique relation identifier.
CZ: Vrac nebo nastavuje slo vztahu.

ForeignKeyRelationItemResult.description: A contract to hold information about record in a relation which is a foreign key.

items.description:
Gets or sets the collection of auditlog entries that belong to this auditlog.
CZ: Vrac nebo nastavuje kolekci poloek auditlogu, kter jsou soust auditlogu.

id.description: Gets or sets unique identifier of a function log.

FunctionLog.description: Data structure representing a function log.

when.description: Gets or sets date and time when function log item was written.

message.description: Gets or sets text message of function log item.

itemId.description: Gets or sets unique identifier of function log item.

FunctionLogItem.description: Data structure representing function log item.

FunctionLogItemLevel.description: Level of a function log item.

FunctionLogItemSeverity.description: Severity of a function log item.

FunctionResultState.description: Enumeration of possible function result states.

recordIds.description:
Gets or sets source records for a function run.
Optional.

GeneralImportFunctionBody.description:
A payload of the function. Typically function parameters if they are defined by the function.
The payload is passed by a request body.,

targetFolderId.description: Unique identifier of the entity (class in terms of HeN), where

deletionDataFilterId.description: An unique identifier of a filter which is used to delete data. Set this property in case ASOL.WebAPI.Core.DataTransfers.Contracts.GeneralImportFunctionParamsItem.DeletionDataMode is ASOL.WebAPI.Core.DataTransfers.Contracts.DeletionDataMode.DeleteAccordingToTheFilter.

dataSource.description:
Source of data to import.
Possible values are: S - import from file. D - import according to database command which is specified in a general import definition.

successTargetFolder.description:
Path to folder where to move imported file if import was without any error.
This property can be filled when data are imported form file (ASOL.WebAPI.Core.DataTransfers.Contracts.GeneralImportFunctionParamsItem.DataSource is "S"), 
in case you want to move imported file to specific folder.
Beware! Function works on application server with temporary copy of file. 
Uploaded file on client side is not reachable by this functionality.

failureTargetFolder.description:
Path to folder where to move imported file if import failed.
This property can be filled when data are imported form file (ASOL.WebAPI.Core.DataTransfers.Contracts.GeneralImportFunctionParamsItem.DataSource is "S"), 
in case you want to move imported file to specific folder.
Beware! Function works on application server with temporary copy of file. 
Uploaded file on client side is not reachable by this functionality.

importFromRow.description:
This property can be specified when data are imported form file (ASOL.WebAPI.Core.DataTransfers.Contracts.GeneralImportFunctionParamsItem.DataSource is "S") and several starting rows are to be omitted.
All rows which row number is lower than this value will be omitted.

importToRow.description:
This property can be specified when data are imported form file (ASOL.WebAPI.Core.DataTransfers.Contracts.GeneralImportFunctionParamsItem.DataSource is "S") and several rows at the end of file are to be omitted.
All rows which row number is greater than this value will be omitted.

errorLimit.description:
The value specifies number of rows imported with any failure (threshold) on which detection of failures is performed.
When this threshold is reached, the execution is immediately canceled.
The value is to be understood as a guide value for entities with items.
Unfilled value or value lower or equal zero means the functionality is switched off and all rows will processed.

GeneralImportFunctionParamsItem.description: Model (contract) of parameters' item for function which imports data using "General Import" functionality.

itemId.description: Identifier of item in a record.

GeneralItemModelResult.description: General contract for items which are used to retrieve items of entity, if no specific model for items is used.

classId.description: Identifier of the class of the entity.

className.description: Localized name of an entity class. Optional.

folderName.description: Localized name of an entity folder. Optional.

lastUpdatedOn.description:
Gets or sets an entity last update date and time.
Value is generated by database on a back-end.
Warning: Some entities does not define this property.

createdOn.description:
Gets or sets date and time when entity was created .
Value is generated by database on a back-end.
Warning: Some entities does not define this property.

gunid.description:
Global record identifier within several databases.
This value is generated by database on a back-end.

createdById.description: Primary key of the creator of the entity/record.

lastUpdatedById.description: Primary key of the last updated user of the entity

GeneralModelResultWithItems.description: Contact of a general model for entities which contains items.

name.description: The name of a column an attribute is mapped to.

IAttributeResult.description: Interface which describes a attribute in results of requests.

relationId.description: The unique identifier of a relation.

symbolicName.description: The symbolic name of a relation (optional).

IForeignKeyRelationItemResult.description: Interface for a contract to hold information about record in a relation which is a foreign key.

resultedRecords.description: Records which were processed by the function.

IFunctionResult.description: Interface for a result contract of functions.

name.description: The name of a column an attribute is mapped to.

IUserDefinedAttributeResult.description: Interface which describes a user defined attribute in results of requests.

fileContentError.description: Error message while content of file was downloaded. Null means no error occurred.

ManagedDocumentItemResult.description: Information about a response item of managed document (Managed Documents Definition of messages).

ManagedDocumentSupplementItemResult.description: Information about a response item of managed document supplement.

ManagedDocumentSupplementsResult.description: Response for getting of document supplements.

ManagedDocumentsResult.description: Response for GET operation for managed documents (Managed Documents Definition of messages).

value.description:
Value of parameter. 
Use appropriate format of value to recognize a type of value.
E.g. "2021-10-06T08:54:51.827Z" for date and time, 123 for integer, 1.23 for decimal, "ABC" for string ... 
When a parameter is a relation, value must contain a composed value like: {"id": 58741,"classId": 1023} .

NameValueParam.description: Name and value pair of parameter.

cena_celkem.description:
Atribut zveejnn pouze pro ten dat
FakturaVydanaDto, DobropisDto

cena_jedn.description:
nen teba dopovat
plat, e
pocet x cen_jedn = cena_zaklad

cena_zaklad.description:
pi doplnn tto hodnoty se aplikan dopln cena_jedn + pocet
default
pocet =1
cena_jedn=cena_zaklad

kod_dph.description: Kd DPH obsahuje referenci na tdu 48 Sazby DPH....kod repretentuje sazbu DPH

pocet.description:
vychoz hodnota = 1
nen teba dopovat
plat, e
pocet x cen_jedn = cena_zaklad

sazba_dph.description:
Atribut zveejnn pouze pro ten dat
FakturaVydanaDto, DobropisDto

ProblemDetails.description: A machine-readable format for specifying errors in HTTP API responses based on  https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7807

id.description: Get valid record number or Record.Empty constant.

RecordId.description: Record identifier for a unique record identification.

RecordPartScope.description: Defines a part of a record

name.description: Display name of period (e.g. Accounting period)

id.description: Value of period in HEX format '0x00AA...'

start.description:
Beginning of a period. 
Optional. Some kinds of periods does not define this property.

end.description:
End of a period.
Optional. Some kinds of periods does not define this property.

RecordPeriodResponse.description: Contract that contains information about periods.

className.description: Localized name of an entity class. Optional.

folderName.description: Localized name of an entity folder. Optional.

gunid.description:
Global record identifier within several databases.
This value is generated by database on a back-end.

createdOn.description:
Gets or sets date and time when entity was created .
Value is generated by database on a back-end.
Warning: Some entities does not define this property.

lastUpdatedOn.description:
Gets or sets an entity last update date and time.
Value is generated by database on a back-end.
Warning: Some entities does not define this property.

reference.description: Reference no. of an entity record.

RelatedRecordModelResult.description:
A contract to hold data of a retrieved related entity/record. Invoice, Customer etc. 
It does not contain all data of entity/record. Only the significant ones.

RelationCollection{IForeignKeyRelationIt.description: Object which contains a collection of related entities/records.

RelationCollection{RelationItemModelResu.description: Object which contains a collection of related entities/records.

records.description:
Information about an related entity/record of the relation.
If ASOL.Nephrite.WebAPI.Contracts.RelationItemModelBase.Side is ASOL.Nephrite.WebAPI.Contracts.RelationSide.Left, this is a TO ROLE record, if  ASOL.Nephrite.WebAPI.Contracts.RelationItemModelBase.Side is  ASOL.Nephrite.WebAPI.Contracts.RelationSide.Right, this is a FROM ROLE record.

relationId.description:
Gets or sets unique relation identifier.
CZ: Vrac nebo nastavuje slo vztahu.

RelationItemModelResult.description: A contract to hold information about records in relation.

RelationSide.description:
Side of relations (ORIENTATION), primarily for dynamic relations.
(For static relation is used ASOL.Nephrite.WebAPI.Contracts.RelationSide.Left)

ReturnFunctionLogDetailType.description: Enumeration of possibilities when detail of a function log should be included in a message.

StringLengthConflict.description: Way how to solve conflicts in max allowed length of text data.

TransactionScope.description: Transaction scope, in which the data are imported.

contentCrc.description:
CRC hash of the file data content.
Be sure you use the same method for calculation of hash on both side of communication - WebAPI - Helios Nephrite application server. 
This is optional property that is calculated on demand. 
If set, the file is uploaded to Helios Nephrite application server, the CRC of uploaded file is checked.
If differs, an exception is thrown .

contentType.description: Gets or sets the raw Content-Type header of the uploaded file.

contentDisposition.description: Gets or sets the raw Content-Disposition header of the uploaded file.

length.description: Gets or sets the file length in bytes.

name.description: Gets or sets the form field name from the Content-Disposition header.

fileName.description: Gets or sets the file name from the Content-Disposition header.

id.description:
Gets or sets the subject identifier.
The same user can have more ASOL.Nephrite.WebAPI.AuthProvider.Contracts.User.Ids when connects using more languages or db profiles.

userName.description: Gets or sets the username (login name or login email).

providerSubjectId.description: Gets or sets the subject identifier from Helios Nephrite.

providerName.description: Gets or sets the name of provider which got ASOL.Nephrite.WebAPI.AuthProvider.Contracts.User.ProviderSubjectId.

systemRole.description: Gets or sets the system role of the user on a server side (admin/user).

email.description: Gets or sets the email of the user.

basicAuth.description:
Basic Authorization header using the Basic scheme. 

 Enter 'UserName' and 'UserId ' values got by api/Connect/LogIn endpoint . 

 E.g. UserName = ASOL\firstname.lastname, Password: 'UserId  ebbea0265....'
